title: 07/14/21 DPS Hour 2 Joe Maddon
itunes:title: 07/14/21 DPS Hour 2 Joe Maddon
description:
Joe Maddon tells Dan that he would compare Shohei Ohtani to Bo Jackson. Joe says that Ohtani is very humble and great for the game of baseball.
